Wraith Sword

two handed weapon (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 83
weap id [weapon]: 110 (Wraith Sword)
damage [dmg]: 11 Partial Life Drain
attack [att]: +2
defence [def]: +3
length [len]: 2
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Requires Two Hands [twohanded], Slashing Damage [slash], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 10D to forge (D2)

When in command of a Wraith Sword, a warrior can replenish his life energy by stealing it from those he cuts down. This sword is often used by powerful undead beings.
